sentences.pinyin: wǒ xǐhuān māo ér bù xǐhuān gǒu。
sentences.translation: I like cats and not dogs.

sentences.simplifiedText: 他虽然没钱，而他的生活却很快乐。
sentences.traditionalText: 他雖然沒錢，而他的生活卻很快樂。
sentences.pinyin: tā suīrán méi qián, ér tā de shēnghuó què hěn kuàilè。
sentences.translation: Although he doesn't have money, his life is very happy.

sentences.pinyin: nǐ lèi le, ér wǒ yě lèi le.
sentences.translation: You are tired, and so am I.

sentences.simplifiedText: 他做得很好，而我们都感到很欣慰。
sentences.traditionalText: 他做得很好，而我們都感到很欣慰。
sentences.pinyin: tā zuò dé hěn hǎo, ér wǒ men dōu gǎn dào hěn xīn wèi.
sentences.translation: He did a great job, and so we all felt comforted.

sentences.simplifiedText: 我已经吃了很多，但是我还想吃。
sentences.traditionalText: 我已經吃了很多，但是我還想吃。
sentences.pinyin: Wǒ yǐjīng chīle hěnduō, ér wǒ hái xiǎng chī.
sentences.translation: I have already eaten a lot, yet I still want to eat.

sentences.simplifiedText: 虽然他已经很晚回家，而他的家人仍旧在等他。
sentences.traditionalText: 雖然他已經很晚回家，而他的家人仍舊在等他。
sentences.pinyin: Suīrán tā yǐjīng hěn wǎn huí jiā, ér tā de jiārén réngjiù zài děng tā.
sentences.translation: Although he came home very late, yet his family was still waiting for him.

sentences.simplifiedText: 她开始害羞，而后来变得更加自信。
sentences.traditionalText: 她開始害羞，而後來變得更加自信。
sentences.pinyin: tā kāishǐ hàixīu, ér hòulái biànde gèngjīa zìxìn.
sentences.translation: She was shy at first, but later became more confident.

sentences.simplifiedText: 他原本不感兴趣，而后来却热衷于学习这门课程。
sentences.traditionalText: 他原本不感興趣，而後來卻熱衷與學習這門課程。
sentences.pinyin: tā yuánběn bù gǎnxìngqù, ér hòulái què rèzhōngyú xúexí zhèmén kèchéng.
sentences.translation: He was initially uninterested, but later became enthusiastic about studying this course.
